normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>981 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：以抛物线发射榴弹攻击敌人，榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.fire>灼热伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>981 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Launches grenades in a ballistic trajectory. The grenades detonate above ground near enemies and deal area of effect <@ba.fire>Heat DMG.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>981 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：以抛物线发射榴弹攻击敌人，榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.fire>灼热伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>981 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Launches grenades in a ballistic trajectory. The grenades detonate above ground near enemies and deal area of effect <@ba.fire>Heat DMG.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>5585 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：以抛物线发射Ⅱ级榴弹攻击敌人，榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.fire>灼热伤害，同时在地面留下一片燃烧区域对敌人造成伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>5585 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Attacks enemies by launching Mk Ⅱ grenades along a ballistic trajectory that detonate above ground near enemies. The grenade explosion deals area of effect <@ba.fire>Heat DMG and leaves a burning zone that deals DMG to enemies within it.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>5585 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：以抛物线发射Ⅱ级榴弹攻击敌人，榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.fire>灼热伤害，同时在地面留下一片燃烧区域对敌人造成伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>5585 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Attacks enemies by launching Mk Ⅱ grenades along a ballistic trajectory that detonate above ground near enemies. The grenade explosion deals area of effect <@ba.fire>Heat DMG and leaves a burning zone that deals DMG to enemies within it.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>5485 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射特制毒雾弹，毒雾弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.natur>自然伤害，同时在地面留下一片毒雾区，对范围内的敌人造成伤害并降低移动速度。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>5485 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Launches special mist grenades that detonate above ground near enemies. The mist grenade explosion deals area of effect <@ba.natur>Nature DMG and leaves a mist zone that deals DMG and slows the movement speed of enemies within the area of effect.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>5485 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射特制毒雾弹，毒雾弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.natur>自然伤害，同时在地面留下一片毒雾区，对范围内的敌人造成伤害并降低移动速度。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>5485 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Launches special mist grenades that detonate above ground near enemies. The mist grenade explosion deals area of effect <@ba.natur>Nature DMG and leaves a mist zone that deals DMG and slows the movement speed of enemies within the area of effect.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射特殊液氮晶体，晶体爆裂后会降低范围内敌人的移动速度。
normalDesc.en: Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Fires special liquid nitrogen (LN) crystals that shatter upon impact to slow the movement speed of enemies in the area of effect.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射特殊液氮晶体，晶体爆裂后会降低范围内敌人的移动速度。
overloadDesc.en: Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Fires special liquid nitrogen (LN) crystals that shatter upon impact to slow the movement speed of enemies in the area of effect.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>22338 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>8秒 攻击方式：消耗大量充能向目标发射射线，对敌人造成高额<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>22338 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>8s Mode of Attack: Consumes vast amounts of energy to emit a beam that deals massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG to enemies.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>22338 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>8秒 攻击方式：消耗大量充能向目标发射射线，对敌人造成高额<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>22338 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>8s Mode of Attack: Consumes vast amounts of energy to emit a beam that deals massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG to enemies.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>4886 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：释放电能攻击敌人，攻击会弹射到附近敌人（至多2次），造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>4886 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Releases electrical arcs that attack enemies. The arc also chains to nearby enemies (up to 2) and deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>4886 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：释放电能攻击敌人，攻击会弹射到附近敌人（至多2次），造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>4886 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Releases electrical arcs that attack enemies. The arc also chains to nearby enemies (up to 2) and deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG.

normalDesc.cn: 最小治疗间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 可将充能转化为治疗量，治疗周围受伤的干员。
normalDesc.en: Minimum HP Treatment Interval: <@ba.key>5s Converts electrical power into healing arts that can treat injured operators nearby.

overloadDesc.cn: 最小治疗间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 可将充能转化为治疗量，治疗周围受伤的干员。
overloadDesc.en: Minimum HP Treatment Interval: <@ba.key>5s Converts electrical power into healing arts that can treat injured operators nearby.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射一道震荡波，对范围内的普通敌人和进阶敌人施加<@ba.vdown>晕眩效果。
normalDesc.en: Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Fires a shockwave that <@ba.vdown>stuns common and advanced enemies within the area of effect.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射一道震荡波，对范围内的普通敌人和进阶敌人施加<@ba.vdown>晕眩效果。
overloadDesc.en: Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Fires a shockwave that <@ba.vdown>stuns common and advanced enemies within the area of effect.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>11634 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：拥有较大攻击范围，优先锁定范围内威胁更高的敌人，对敌人造成高额<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>11634 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Unleashes long-range attacks that target high-threat enemies first and deal massive <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>11634 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：拥有较大攻击范围，优先锁定范围内威胁更高的敌人，对敌人造成高额<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>11634 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Unleashes long-range attacks that target high-threat enemies first and deal massive <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>609 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>2秒 攻击方式：持续发射能量弹，对敌人造成<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>609 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>2s Mode of Attack: Continuously fires energy bolts that deal <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>609 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>2秒 攻击方式：持续发射能量弹，对敌人造成<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>609 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>2s Mode of Attack: Continuously fires energy bolts that deal <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

normalDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>2136 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>2秒 攻击方式：持续发射Ⅱ级能量弹，每第4次攻击会发射一次强力能量弹，对敌人造成<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
normalDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>2136 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>2s Mode of Attack: Continuously fires Mk II energy bolts with every 4th shot being an empowered bolt. The bolts deal <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

overloadDesc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>2136 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>2秒 攻击方式：持续发射Ⅱ级能量弹，每第4次攻击会发射一次强力能量弹，对敌人造成<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
overloadDesc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>2136 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>2s Mode of Attack: Continuously fires Mk II energy bolts with every 4th shot being an empowered bolt. The bolts deal <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.
